us.codecraft.webmagic.selector

类 AndSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.AndSelector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Selector

    public class AndSelector
extends Object
implements Selector
    All selectors will be arranged as a pipeline.
    The next selector uses the result of the previous as source.
    从以下版本开始:
    0.2.0
    作者:
    code4crafter@gmail.com

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AndSelector(List<Selector> selectors) 
      AndSelector(Selector... selectors) 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String select(String text)
      Extract single result in text.
      List<String> selectList(String text)
      Extract all results in text.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • select

        public String select(String text)
        从接口复制的说明: Selector
        Extract single result in text.
        If there are more than one result, only the first will be chosen.
        指定者:
        select 在接口中 Selector
        参数:
        text - text
        返回:
        result

      • selectList

        public List<String> selectList(String text)
        从接口复制的说明: Selector
        Extract all results in text.
        指定者:
        selectList 在接口中 Selector
        参数:
        text - text
        返回:
        results
